name: Infestation (itch) (KnightKnight28)
description:
Created by EDPGames.

Modifications:

1.) Created 3 new Jungle themed levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in the game.

2.) Changed the music.

3.) Change the menus.

4.) Added new obstacles and challenges - Player can drown under the water.  Player can only hold breath for 5 s.

Credit to Prof Brian Winn.
